solution_line_template: Making the round trip to school means driving from the house to school and then back, for a total of {school_trip_distance}+{school_trip_distance} = <<{school_trip_distance}+{school_trip_distance}={round_trip_school_distance}>>{round_trip_school_distance} miles
The round trip (once a week) to the market is {market_trip_distance}+{market_trip_distance} = <<{market_trip_distance}+{market_trip_distance}={weekly_market_mileage}>>{weekly_market_mileage} miles.
His total mileage for a typical week = {weekly_school_mileage}+{weekly_market_mileage} = <<{weekly_school_mileage}+{weekly_market_mileage}={total_weekly_mileage}>>{total_weekly_mileage} miles
